DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the safety and efficacy of fluvastatin in children diagnosed with heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Fluvastatin in Children With Heterozygous Familial Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: 1016 years old Heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia Homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia Pregnant or lactating females Major surgery during the six month prior study Other protocol defined inclusion and exclusion criteria may apply
